Queries.AddTakenInfo: INSERT INTO ct_db.teken (InTake, Total_Take, Take_To, ThroughBy_Take, Take_Date, Remarks_Take, TDT_V, TDT_V_Date, DDT_V_Date, T_Insrt_Person) VALUES (@InTake, @Total_Take, @Take_To, @ThroughBy_Take, @Take_Date, @Remarks_Take, @TDT_V, @TDT_V_Date, @DDT_V_Date, @T_Insrt_Person);
Queries.UpdateTakenData: UPDATE ct_db.teken SET InTake = @InTake, Total_Take = @Total_Take, Take_To = @Take_To, ThroughBy_Take = @ThroughBy_Take, Take_Date = @Take_Date, Remarks_Take = @Remarks_Take, TDT_V = @TDT_V, TDT_V_Date = @TDT_V_Date, DDT_V_Date = @DDT_V_Date, T_Insrt_Person = @T_Insrt_Person, T_Updt_Person = @T_Updt_Person, T_Del_Person = @T_Del_Person WHERE InTake = @InTake;
